TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in PERSON .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was dismissed from his position as a department manager ( начальник бюро ) of ORG ( “ the Company , ” GPE державний експериментальний оптико-механічний завод ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted civil proceedings in the GPE ORG ( “ ORG , ” Ленінський районний суд м. Вінниця ) , seeking his reinstatement and compensation for unlawful dismissal . On DATE the ORG stayed the proceedings until resolution of another dispute between the applicant and the Company .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant requested that the proceedings be resumed , as the aforementioned dispute had been resolved to his satisfaction . On CARDINAL DATE the applicant complained to ORG ( Управління юстиції ORG області ) that ORG had never responded to his request of DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG informed the applicant that on DATE it had discontinued the consideration of his claims because of his repetitive failures to attend the hearings . In DATE the applicant appealed against this decision .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG granted the applicant an extension for lodging his appeal , having noted that the applicant had not been informed about the decision of CARDINAL DATE in due time .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( “ ORG , ” PERSON суд ORG області ) quashed the decision of CARDINAL DATE on the ground that ORG had not duly summoned the applicant to attend the hearings and remitted the case for a fresh consideration to the GPE ORG ( “ ORG , ” PERSON суд м. Вінниця ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's claims . On DATE the applicant appealed against this judgment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of CARDINAL DATE . In DATE CARDINAL the applicant appealed in cassation .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the appeal for having being lodged out of time . The applicant appealed against this decision .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the decision of DATE . In DATE the applicant appealed in cassation against the decisions of CARDINAL DATE and CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . By omission of the court personnel , the applicant 's cassation appeal was transferred to ORG only in DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's request for leave to appeal in cassation .
